query:
SELECT
                st.stop_id,
                st.arrival,
                st.departure,
                t.route_id,
                t.direction,
                t.assigned,
                t.id AS trip_id
            FROM
                stop_times st
            LEFT JOIN trips t 
                ON
                t.id = st.trip_id
            WHERE
                st.arrival BETWEEN now() AND (now() + INTERVAL '4 hours')
            OR t.id IN (
                SELECT DISTINCT trip_id
                FROM stop_times
                WHERE arrival > now()
            )
            ORDER BY
                st.arrival
